mapper.select: select f.*, m.* from friend f join member m on f.one=m.id where m.id=#{id} and f.status='snd'
select f.*, m.* from friend f join member m on f.one=m.id where m.id=#{id} and f.status='frd'
select f.*, m.* from friend f join member m on f.one= m.id where m.id=#{one} and f.other=#{other}
